description:
Rift of the Necrodancer is a rhythm game where you hit monsters to the beat of one of 60+ songs.
Play through a selection of randomly chosen songs, collecting diamonds
until you have enough to play and complete the goal song!

v0.1.1.description:
# Bug fixes
- [Client] Fixed "She Banned" not unlocking properly when song item is sent
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.10.0.description:
# New Features
- [APWorld + Client] EXPERIMENTAL: Added custom song support.  Refer to the [Setup Guide](https://github.com/studkid/Archipelago/blob/RotN/worlds/rotn/docs/setup_en.md) for more info on how to set it up.
- [APWorld] Added March of the Profane to the song list
- [Client] Added free play mode
    - Unlocks all songs to allow you to play them in bk without sending checks
    - May need to reload the song select menu when toggling
- [APWorld] Now supports YAML-less generation with Universal Tracker
- [APWorld] Added `include_song_percentage` option
    - Lets you set a percentage chance for whether included songs are actually included or not

# Changes
- [APWorld] Rearranged yaml option groups a bit

# Fixes
- [Client] Minigames/Boss Battles should send properly now regardless of language settings
- [Client] Fixed Rhythm Rifts sending items before finishing the song
    - Should fix errors with score requirements not being met if enabled
v0.10.0.title: v0.10.0

v0.2.description:
# New Additions
- [AP World + Client] Added support for the Celeste DLC songs

# Tweaks
- [Client] Change display text to not say "System.Int32[]" in the status line
v0.2.title: v0.2

v0.3.description:
# New Additions
- [APWorld] Added support for the Pizza Tower, Anniversary, Miku and Hololive song packs
- [APWorld] Allow for remix mode rhythm rifts to be shuffled as separate items/locations
- [APWorld] Implemented Minigame and Boss Battle shuffle
- [APWorld] Added Min/Max Difficulty filter options to be used when creating the map pool
- [APWorld] Added Goal Song Pool option (Contributed by  @SchwartzGandhi)
- [APWorld] Increase the AdditionalSongs range from `100` max to `2000` max

# Improvements
- [Client] Pressing Left-Alt now should let the cursor be visible
     - Sometimes hitting certain things will cause the cursor to hide again
v0.3.title: v0.3 Release

v0.3-pre.description:
# New Additions
- [APWorld] Added support for the Pizza Tower, Anniversary and Miku song packs
- [APWorld] Allow for remix mode rhythm rifts to be shuffled as separate items/locations
- [APWorld] Implemented Minigame and Boss Battle shuffle
- [APWorld] Added Min/Max Difficulty filter options to be used when creating the map pool
- [APWorld] Added Goal Song Pool option (Contributed by  @SchwartzGandhi)

# Improvements
- [Client] Pressing Left-Alt now should let the cursor be visible
     - Sometimes hitting certain things will cause the cursor to hide again
v0.3-pre.title: v0.3 Pre-Release

v0.3-pre2.description:
# Bugfixes
- [APWorld] Update option descriptions for `diamond_count_percentage` and `dlc_songs`
- [Client] Should no longer stall when opening the song menu when not connected
- [Client] Rhythm Rift locations should send normally again.
v0.3-pre2.title: v0.3 Pre-Release 2

v0.3-pre3.description:
# Bugfixes
- [APWorld] Fix item ID conflicts for a few songs

Note: if you genned a seed on an prior pre-release, `Unexpectancy, Pt. 3` and `World Wide Noise` will be impossible to do and will need to be manually released.

v0.3.1.description:
# Changes
- [APWorld] Removed unicode less aliases for `M@GICAL☆CURE! LOVE ♥ SHOT!` for the dlc packs option
    - (I kinda meant to remove this entirely since it wouldn't work with include/exclude songs so oops)

# Bug Fixes
- [APWorld] Fix more item id conflicts (`Show Time!` conflicted with `Voguelike (Hard)`)
- [APWorld] Having min difficulty a higher difficulty than max now raises an OptionError

v0.3.2.description:
# Bugfixes
- [APWorld] Actually fix all the item conflicts this time I swear (all 3 `The Necrodancer` items overrode all the `Take a Breather` items)
- [APWorld] Fix difficulty level filtering
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2

v0.4.description:
# New Features
- Added Everhood DLC songs

# Known bugs
- If the goal song is set to a Remix, Boss Battle or Minigame, it will not unlock properly or let you goal.  If you enable Remixes, Boss Battles or Minigames in the yaml, it's recommended to add at least 1 normal rhythm rift song to your `goal_song_pool`.
v0.4.title: v0.4

v0.5.description:
# New Changes
- [APWorld] Added Monstercat DLC songs
- [APWorld] Removed the death link setting

# Known bugs
- If the goal song is set to a Remix, Boss Battle or Minigame, it will not unlock properly or let you goal.  If you enable Remixes, Boss Battles or Minigames in the yaml, it's recommended to add at least 1 normal rhythm rift song to your `goal_song_pool`.
v0.5.title: v0.5

v0.6.description:
# New Features
- [APWorld + Client] Implemented Minimum Grade and Full Combo requirements for location clears (Contributed by @Doggitoz) 
- [Client] Improved connection UI (Contributed by @Doggitoz)
- [APWorld] Added support for Universal Tracker
- [APWorld] Added various item groups
- [APWorld] Added web docs

# Changes
- [APWorld] Changed Difficulty filter selections to be a single list, instead of a range (hopefully should fix some jank with the filtering options too)
- [APWorld] Reordered yaml options to use option groups
- [APWorld] Created web host docs

# Bug Fixes
- [APWorld + Client] Remixes, Minigames, and Boss goal songs should now be unlocked properly
v0.6.title: v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
# Bug Fixes
- [APWorld] Fixed capitalization error on a few monstercat songs
    - This should fix the issue with certain songs not unlocking properly on the mod
v0.6.1.title: v0.6.1

v0.7.description:
# New Additions
- [APWorld] Added `Shovel Knight` DLC songs

# Changes
- [APWorld] Renamed the `FreeDLC` item group to `Free Promo`

Note: No client changes since 0.6.0
v0.7.title: v0.7

v0.7.1.description:
# Fixes
- [APWorld] Songs added via `included_songs` now won't be added as items or locations if other settings would otherwise have excluded them
    - Notably you won't get remixes, boss battles or minigames added if you don't have it's respective options on
    - As a side effect, included songs no longer override songs removed from the pool due to intensity/difficulty filters
    - Also applies to song items added via `start_inventory`, although it won't remove the item, it just won't create a location for it.
-  [Client] Opening up a submenu (like the settings menu) now properly prevents interactions on the main menu.
v0.7.1.title: v0.7.1

v0.8.description:
# Additions
- [APWorld] Added Friday Night Funkin' and Unbeatable DLC songs

This is an apworld only update, if you already had mod version 0.7.1 installed you do not need to update.
v0.8.title: v0.8

v0.8.1.description:
# Additions
- [APWorld] Goal song and diamond goal amount is now visible from the spoiler log

# Bug Fixes
- [Client] Added error handling to slot data
- [APWorld] FNF and Unbeatable songs no longer have the wrong song type
    - (This broke the mod if they were picked as a goal song)
- [APWorld] Fixed `duplicate_song_items` option still adding dupe songs when set to 0
v0.8.1.title: v0.8.1

v0.8.2.description:
# Bug Fixes
- [APWorld] Fixed too many filler items being placed after a fix from the last update

No client update for this version
v0.8.2.title: v0.8.2

v0.9.0.description:
# Additions
- [APWorld] Added Portabellohead into the song pool

# Bug Fixes
- [APWorld] Medium/Hard minigames no longer have the same item ID
- [APWorld] Goal songs can now properly choose songs from the included list
- [APWorld] No longer fails gen if filtering options filter out every song due to invalid intensity ranges or failing to select any difficulties
    - In the case this does happen, the intensity range will slowly increase (starting with lowering the min intensity), or resetting `difficulty_option` to default if no difficulties are selected in the first place.
    
This is an apworld only update, no changes have been made to the mod since v0.8.1
v0.9.0.title: v0.9.0
